âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Web interface for PDF table extraction â€¢ Powered by Camelot library
ðŸ“– Summary: Excalibur is a web interface built with Python that simplifies the extraction of tabular data from PDF files. It leverages the Camelot library to provide advanced table detection and extraction capabilities, supporting both line-based (Lattice) and whitespace-based (Stream) tables. Excalibur allows users to save extraction settings for consistent results across similar PDF documents and offers various output formats, ensuring a streamlined workflow for converting PDF tables into usable data.
